tool_description: Global IP address lookup to search for your real IP, coordinates, country, city, time zone, etc., and to receive country information and user device model and language.
name: IP Location Finder
title: IP Location Finder

api_list.name: IP Finder
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-location-finder.p.rapidapi.com/geoip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-location-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-location-finder.p.rapidapi.com/geoip"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-location-finder.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
